abstract: Letter by William R Calnon, president of the American Dental Association, responds to Oct 14 article on water fluoridation.
snippet: A reader responds to an news article on a growing number of cities and towns who have stopped adding fluoride to their water, driven by tight budgets and inconclusive findings on its benefits.
lead_paragraph: A reader responds to an news article on a growing number of cities and towns who have stopped adding fluoride to their water, driven by tight budgets and inconclusive findings on its benefits.

headline.seo: Water Fluoridation: A Word From the American Dental Association
